A registered charity providing a free confidential support service within a safe environment for affected relatives and friends of drug users. Offers one-to-one appointments, home visits, drop-ins and telephone support.
Support groups are available including specialist groups for men, groups for those looking after grandchildren because of substance misuse and those bereaved as a result of substance misuse. Also has a support group for the families and friends of alcohol users.
Runs a programme of learning opportunities for families and friends including information sessions on drugs and the effects substance misuse has on families. Also holds regular respite events and activities to give families time out.
Presentations given to community groups and professionals. Self or any referral.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: City centre support group and drop-in venues. Please contact for details.
